name: Expenses
description: Track your expenses grouped by vendors and categories.

name: Vendor Cloner
description: Easily clone/duplicate the vendor together with the setting and the full menu. Useful for multi-branch / similar vendors.

name: Stripe Link Checkout
description: This module will enable Stripe Payments in WhatsApp and Stripe Payments in the client mobile app of FoodTiger.

name: Google Translate
description: Translate your restaurant menus into multiple languages. You can select what languages you want to display.

name: Staff
description: Add staff to each restaurant, so they can manage the orders.

name: WebHooks
description: Integrate your project with hundreds of tools via Zappier  Integromat or custom API.

name: PDF Invoice
description: Print orders bills on printer or export in PDF

name: Impressum
description: Add Impressum on the bottom of the menu

name: Vendor app
description: Give your vendors mobile app where they can manage the orders ( iOS + Android )

name: Driver app
description: Give your driver mobile app where they can manage the orders ( iOS + Android )

name: Client app
description: Give your clients mobile app where they can make orders from your vendors ( iOS + Android )

name: Custom Timezone
description: Give your vendors option to set their own timezone

name: Automated Printing
description: Automated printing on thermal and regular printer. Via printnode.com

name: PayPal Payments
description: Accept payments for orders via PayPal

name: FlutterWave
description: Accept payments for orders via FlutterWave

name: PayPal Subscribe
description: Accept subscriptions for plans via PayPal

name: Paddle Subscribe
description: Accept subscriptions for plans via Paddle

name: Mollie Payments
description: Accept payments for orders via Mollie

name: Razorpay Payments
description: Accept payments for orders via Razorpay

name: Mercadopago Payments
description: Accept payments for orders via Mercadopago

name: Paystack Payments
description: Accept payments for orders via Paystack

name: PayFast Payments
description: Accept payments for orders via PayFast
